text: Michel Mongeau (February 9, 1965 – May 22, 2010) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player.http://www.canoe.com/sports/nouvelles/hockey/archives/2010/05/20100523-202511.html Mongeau was born in Nuns' Island, Quebec. ==Biography== As a youth, Mongeau played in the 1977 and 1978 Quebec International Pee-Wee Hockey Tournaments with a minor ice hockey team from Verdun, Quebec. He played 54 games in the National Hockey League: 50 with the St. Louis Blues and four with the Tampa Bay Lightning.
